Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
MAXPIA ICT Co., Ltd. was founded in 2016 as an ICT and blockchain technology company based in Gwangju, Korea. The company focuses on system integration, blockchain node operations, smart contracts, and high-speed transaction services.

One of its main initiatives is the Quantum Chain (QCC) project, which aims to build a secure and high-performance blockchain platform inspired by quantum computing concepts.
